name: truly-notable-mcp-bridge
description: MCP bridge for Truly Notable note-taking app.
long_description: Connects Claude to your local Truly Notable app through a high-performance Swift MCP bridge, enabling note creation, retrieval, intelligent search, and AI-extracted metadata access. Requires Truly Notable app installed with MCP server enabled.

port.title: TrulyNotable Server Port
port.description: Port where your TrulyNotable server is running

host.title: TrulyNotable Server Host
host.description: Host address of your TrulyNotable server

tools.name: create_note
tools.description: Create a new note with optional content and AI metadata extraction

tools.name: get_note
tools.description: Retrieve a specific note by ID with full content and metadata

tools.name: search_notes
tools.description: Search notes by content with AI-aware relevance scoring

tools.name: get_note_metadata
tools.description: Get AI-extracted metadata including entities, tasks, and relationships

tools.name: list_recent_notes
tools.description: List recently modified notes with metadata indicators
